channel.title: Official Ventus - Be Ready
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/2h7jw60.jpg[/img]
[font=trebuchet ms] My last Ventus project did not go as planned, I was rushed into releasing the server before it was ready. This caused many issues and complications which forced me to actually quit Rsps. I did quit. For two WHOLE days. However, upon closing Ventus I realized I had already had a player base. This has motivated me to continue developing Ventus. This time however, I will not be rushed. I will take my time, develop on my time, and have fun while doing it.
We have used Jacks clean PI for this project. I actually started the project on 4/2/2013, but did not make a project thread until now. We already started developing since then and we have accomplished a lot.
[size=24pt][b][u]Development Team:[/u][/b][/size]
Play Boy - Server/Client Developer Gamma - Server/Client Developer Envy- - Forum Developer
[size=24pt][b][u]Features:[/u][/b][/size]
* 100% Constitution ( Perfectly synced with x10 Hitmarkers ) * 508 Maps & Objects * 602 Animations, Graphics, & NPCs * 634 Items & Characters * Exp Counter * 525 Gameframe * Fully Health, Prayer, Run Orbs * Improved Client Look & Feel * Perfect PvP System * Run Energy + Resting * New Runescape Hitmarkers + Criticals * Fully Working Dragon Claws * Perfect Korasi Sword * Quick Prayers
[size=24pt][b][u]Media:[/u][/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xsK1IQa.png[/img] [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/6205/63ec051b890d4cb2ad0ebe4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/sb2bu1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/2558/f87782ca60434e30863682f.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/4848/runenergy2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://oi48.tinypic.com/os5uog.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt][b][u]Credits:[/u][/b][/size]
Gamma Envy- Frostbit3 'Jerba Jason Meerster iQuality [/font][/center]

item.title: Official Ventus - Be Ready
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Oh recently got involved in school more. Need to keep them grades up. Will start developing this, and I am most likely going to introduce more developers into Ventus.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Ventus - Be Ready
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[center]

[font=trebuchet ms]
My last Ventus project did not go as planned, I was rushed into releasing the server before it was ready. This caused many issues and complications which forced me to actually quit Rsps. I did quit. For two WHOLE days. However, upon closing Ventus I realized I had already had a player base. This has motivated me to continue developing Ventus. This time however, I will not be rushed. I will take my time, develop on my time, and have fun while doing it.

We have used Jacks clean PI for this project. I actually started the project on 4/2/2013, but did not make a project thread until now. We already started developing since then and we have accomplished a lot.

[size=24pt]Development Team:[/size]

Play Boy - Server/Client Developer
Gamma - Server/Client Developer
Envy- - Forum Developer

[size=24pt]Features:[/size]

  • 100% Constitution ( Perfectly synced with x10 Hitmarkers )
  • 508 Maps & Objects
  • 602 Animations, Graphics, & NPCs
  • 634 Items & Characters
  • Exp Counter
  • 525 Gameframe
  • Fully Health, Prayer, Run Orbs
  • Improved Client Look & Feel
  • Perfect PvP System
  • Run Energy + Resting
  • New Runescape Hitmarkers + Criticals
  • Fully Working Dragon Claws
  • Perfect Korasi Sword
  • Quick Prayers
